post.text: "We don't miss voting in my family." A story from the 1992 presidential campaign that President Bill Clinton will never forget:

comment.author: Victoria
comment.text: Hillary deletes 33k yoga emails, Huma hides 650K emails, Robby Mook deletes all his tweets Clinton campaign in flames! ðŸ˜‚ #draintheswamp

replies.text: And Huma Hussein Weiner is still missing.

replies.text: She's in so deep it's insane.
